analyzed: jātaka  eka ka nipāta  attha kāma vagga
translated: The Jātaka🔽The Group of Fives🔽The Chapter of Those Who Seek Welfare
The Jātaka of the Park-Damaging Monkey
“One who is not skilled in what is harmful
finds that the practice of what is beneficial brings happiness.
The foolish one destroys what is beneficial,
like the monkey who damaged the park.”
The Jātaka of the Park-Damaging Monkey, the sixth.
